choice_description: Standard vinyl siding
Vinyl siding with OSB underneath for extra durability of your home.  We STRONGLY recommend this option if you want vinyl siding.
Durable and beautiful, this plank siding looks like wood siding, and it will keep your home beautiful for years to come.
There will be a cabinet instead of a spot for a dishwasher. It is important to note there there will be no hookups for a dishwasher.
A standard sized dishwasher from Frigidare will be installed.  Color = Black
R-14 Insulation in attic, R-11 Insulation in walls, and R. 11 insulation in the floor.
R-30 Insulation in attic, R-11 Insulation in walls, and R. 22 insulation in the floor.  Upgrading your insulation package usually pays for itself in energy bill savings.
Thermal Zone 3 insulation with Low E thermal pane windows, smart thermostat, & LED Light Bulbs).  Upgrading to the Energy Star package usually pays for itself in energy bill savings.
Carpet in bedroom and livingroom with Linoleum Floors in the Kitchen, Dining Room, and Bathrooms
Linoleum Flooring throughout the entire home
An exterior door that opens directly to the outside
Storm Door on the exterior with a standard exterior door that opens to the inside
Standard Light Fixture is installed.  It is not suitable to later install a ceiling fan without additional bracing.

choice_name: Ceiling Fan Ready (Wire and Brace installed)
choice_description: Extra wiring and bracing installed ready for a ceiling fan to be installed by the homeowner.  A standard Light fixture will be in be installed in the living room.
Rated for Wind Zone I designated areas, which is a majority of the United States
Rated for installation in Wind Zone II designated areas.  You can install in Wind Zone I areas.  Because installation costs change depending on location, please call for an exact price.
Rated for installation in Wind Zone III designated areas.  You can install in Wind Zone I or II areas.  Because installation costs change depending on location, please call for an exact price.
